channel.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Video Podcasts - Tutorials
channel.description: Videos of Maine Ghost Hunters featuring investigations, team documentaries and instructional information sessions.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Tutorials and How-To Videos
channel.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters training tutorials are helpful tips we've put into video form, with the goal of assisting people who would like to know how we go about completing certain tasks. Everyone has their way of doing things, these videos show the viewer how we go about doing what we do.
channel.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, paranormal, spirit, haunted, investigation, training, help, tutorial, how-to, assistance
channel.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - 20-125 - Tutorial
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters Team Leader TonyL and Jr. Tech. Member TJ get together to show you how to properly modify a Radio Shack am-fm model 20-125 into a fully functional Ghost Box.
Feel free to join our Maine Ghost Hunters forum at www.maineghosthunters.net to discuss this and other paranormal topics.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Ghost Box 20-125- Tutorial
item.itunes:summary:

item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Maine, paranormal, ghost, box, modification, radio, shack, hack, 20-125
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Trial Run Ghost Box 20-125 - Tutorial
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters Team Leader TonyL and Jr. Tech. Member TJ test out their freshly modified AM-FM Radio Shack radio, which they converted into a Ghost Box just minutes earlier. Join us as we watch Tony use the Ghost Box for the first time, and as he explains how the box works and what you can expect during usage.
Maine Ghost Hunters welcomes you to join our forum, located at www.maineghosthunters.net to discuss this and other paranormal topics.

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Ghost Box 12-150 - Tutorial
item.description: Maine Ghost Hunters Jr. Tech. Department Member, TJ, shows you how to make your own ghost box using a hack for the radio shack model 12-150. You'll need a precision tool set, a sharp cutting tool, a flashlight, and a screwdriver.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Ghost Box 12-150- Tutorial
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters Jr. Tech. Department Member, TJ, shows you how to make your own ghost box using a hack for the radio shack model 12-150. You'll need a precision tool set, a sharp cutting tool, a flashlight, and a screwdriver.
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Maine, paranormal, ghost, box, modification, radio, shack, hack, 12-150, investigation
